features: ARGAN OIL INFUSED FORMULA Tames frizz and smooths down fly-aways
SMOOTHNESS AND SHINE Transforms dry and frizz hair back to shiny, smooth & manageable strands
HAIR CUT CANCELED Helps reduce split ends so you can skip the cut
CLEAN INGREDIENTS 0% Sulfates, Parabens, Dyes, or Mineral Oil
PROTECT FROM THE INSIDE OUT Protective antioxidants, Pro-vitamin B5 and Strengthening Lipids
body.description: Say goodbye to frizz and welcome back smoothness and shine. Pantene Pro-V Blends Argan Oil Conditioner is a sulfate free nutrient-rich formula crafted with a blend of argan oil, Vitamin B5 and antioxidants to tame frizz, smooth down fly-aways, and restore your hair's natural shine and hair pattern. This anti-frizz formula provides nutrient-rich sulfate free bond protection and transforms dry and frizzy hair back to hydrated, flowy locks. Every time you step into the shower, enjoy smooth, hydrated hair with the help of this sulfate-free Argan Oil infused conditioner. The Pantene Pro-V Blends Argan Oil Collection has been developed to bring out the best of your hair, with nutrient-rich ingredients free from sulfates, parabens, dyes, and mineral oil. HOW TO USE After washing with your Pantene Pro-V Blends Argan Oil Shampoo, massage Pantene Pro-V Blends Argan Oil Conditioner into your hair. Make sure to pay special attention to your ends for the best results. Rinse thoroughly. Dry and style your hair as you would normally. We strive to bring you innovative formulas using proven ingredients, so that every product we make helps you face the world with confidence. Transform the hair you have to the hair you want for more great hair days.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Compare Conditioners Tames Frizz Benefit Reduces Hair Loss Argan Oil Key Ingredient Rice Water Sulfate Free Smoother Hair Hair Need Fuller-Looking Hair Color Safe Tames Frizz Benefit Moisturize / Soothe Argan Oil Key Ingredient Rose Water Sulfate Free Smoother Hair Hair Need Moisturized Hair Color Safe

Will Pantene Pro-V Blends Argan Oil work for my hair type? Yes, it's designed for many different hair types. It provides lightweight nourishment without weighing down strands and enough conditioning to transform dry, frizzy, damaged locks into shiny, smooth hair. Is the conditioner clear or creamy? It’s a creamy, lightweight conditioner that will help restore your hair’s natural shine. Infused with argan oil, it tames frizz and smooths down flyaways for smooth, manageable strands. Do I need to use Pantene Pro-V Blends Argan Oil Shampoo with this conditioner? For best results and more great hair days, it’s recommended to pair this conditioner with Pantene Pro-V Blends Argan Oil Shampoo. However, it’s still effective when used alone without the matching shampoo. Is Pantene cruelty-free? Pantene has been committed to ending animal testing for over 30 years. We do not test our products on animals and have been actively working with governments around the world to put an end to animal testing for good. Why is sulfate-free important? While sulfates are a common cleaning ingredient, some Pantene fans prefer alternatives that are free from specific ingredients. With that in mind, we created formulas that are free sulfates, parabens, and silicones while still delivering great hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Hair feels so soft and smells great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It lathers up with a small amount of product. I don't have to use conditioner, very good shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the smell not the price
reviews.reviewText: I do love the smell. But it’s very pricey and honestly I think my usual brand (whole blends honey treasure) works a little better on my hair. Don’t get me wrong this works good on my hair. I have long thinner hair which is colored so I deal with a lot of knots if not conditioned well enough.

reviews.reviewText: It works fine for my hair, but it kind of smells unpleasant and is a huge container so now I'm stuck with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves hair soft and healthy
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo really does what it says! My hair feels much healthier and looks shiny. I love that it doesn’t have any harsh chemicals this is a plus! I will definitely purchase again worth the money!
